text: Va Mo pes az tu ej Pajomʙar, ʙa pajomʙari nafiristodem, magar mardonero az mardumi sahrho va oʙodiho, ki ʙa onho vahj mekardem. Ojo dar rui zamin namegardand, to ʙingarand, ki pojoni kori pesinijonason onon, ki ʙeimon ʙudand, ci ʙudaast? Va hamono saroji oxirat parhezgoronro ʙehtar ast, caro nameandesed
